history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?
USER the waterfront
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Beth the Highland
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER Fifth and Highland
TTS Okay, leaving from highland avenue at fifth avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER immediately
TTS Okay, travelling at 01:28 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 28 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 64 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Target Dr at Target Perimeter Rd.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 1:55pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER done
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 2 mins to 149 West Bridge St, Homestead, PA 15120, USA. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER repeat that
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 2 mins to 149 West Bridge St, Homestead, PA 15120, USA. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER go back.
TTS Please tell me when it's ok to continue.
USER continue
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER no.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
